about_the_game:
Play as Lightning Max, a Class A Hero who uses his Lightning Shoes to perform explosive kicks, in ONE PUNCH MAN: A HERO NOBODY KNOWS.
This pack also includes an original story for Lightning Max.

Contents:
- Additional playable character: Lightning Max
- Original Lightning Max story
- Avatar Parts
- A Killer Move for your avatar
